about_the_game:
◼︎ Summary◼︎

Ordinary you are suddenly taken to the dreamlands one day.
What unfolds before your eyes is the cruel Cthulhu mythical world where gods and mythical creatures coexist, and the strong can do whatever they want. You meet the heroine "Shunith" here and live with her.

To return to the real world or achieve a happy ending with Shunith...? 
To find happiness or the truth...? 

What ending will you choose?

◼︎ Game Content ◼︎

【Beautiful and moving erotic events!】

✦ Most of the erotic events are smoothly animated!

500+ moves! Super long! Not only some parts, but also the breasts, body, and even the cock provider move! Even the light source moves! Super high quality!!

In addition to the moving erotic event scenes, there are also full of erotic voices!

✦ Erotic CG: More than 140 pictures including differential!

✦ A total of more than 43,000 words of erotic heroine voices! Most of the erotic events contain erotic voices!

【Interaction with the heroine】
As long as you get home, you can talk to Shunith, ask her to change clothes, or even do sexy things at any time!
Shunith’s portrait is in Live2D! Not only is her expression rich but her breasts and body also move seductively!
In addition, there are 20 types of clothes to change! There are as many as 26 expressions!

 

【A fantasy and magnificent world! Beautifully crafted map!】
The protagonist who is thrown into the world of Cthulhu Mythos needs the help of the heroine to survive in this world!

✦ Time, food, and sleep mechanics! 
An immersive simulation game that makes you feel like you are actually living in that world!
✦ Plant crops in the fields and make dishes with the harvested vegetables! 
In addition, you can also use woodworking to make the collected materials into items that can be used in adventures, or knit materials to make the heroine's clothes!

【During the adventure, you will also encounter pornographic events of battle or defeat!】
If you encounter an enemy on the map, there is a chance that an erotic incident will occur during the battle! And once you lose, you will be r*ped immediately!

✦ Once you have experienced the defeat and battle H events and saved, you can watch it anytime from the menu! You can also rewind in the gallery!
✦ There are also erotic events involving female mythological creatures other than Shunith!

 

【Battle scenes using beautiful and unique UI!】
Use skills and magic to fight against terrifying mythical creatures! The combat is in traditional RPG mechanics, and the enemies also have beautiful images and can move!
Although Shunith cannot fight, she will provide you with various supports!
Just being together can increase the resistance to debuffs!
There are also skills that can only be used when Shunith is around!
Sometimes you also see Shunith being attacked by mythical creatures...?!
 

◼︎ Erotic events ◼︎

【Story mode】
You can enjoy the pure love story with Shunith!
There are 30 erotic events filled with erotic voices!
29 of the events are dubbed! (Part of the introduction is not dubbed, but erotic events are fully dubbed)
From orthodox sex to more kinky content, there are various plays such as vibrator, vibrate egg, anal sex, SM Play, Pet Play, Maid Play, etc.!
 

【Free sex mode】
You can choose your favorite erotic event setting and play with Shunith freely!
Whether it's caressing, penetration, or sex toys, you can do whatever you like!
Of course, there are also erotic voices and movements! There are a total of 8 types of free sex to choose from!
There are more than 120 interactions in all the erotic events combined!

 

【Touch mode】
You can do erotic pranks on Shunith! There are more than 40 kinds of H interactions in total!
99% of dubbing!!
(Part of the introduction is not dubbed, but the erotic events are fully dubbed)

 

【H value】
Shunith has H values! The erotic history recorded on her body! The more you do it, the hornier Shunith will become!
Increasing the value will not only unlock new erotic events but also increase the number of erotic lines spoken by Shunith!

 

◼︎ Characters ◼︎

【Heroine】

Shunith

She looks about 20 years old. She is probably a human?
163cm　B93　W61　H89

A cheerful and gentle girl. Although she lost her memory and didn't know who she was, she doesn't seem to care.
She likes to take care of people and is very expressive. Her favorite things are dressing up and eating sweets. She is a loose cannon sometimes and has a three-minute passion.
She cares a lot about the protagonist and can't let him go.
In fact, she is a very open and erotic girl.

 

【Protagonist】
The player's avatar projected into the dreamlands
You can set a name and enter a birthday.
(There is a birthday event, and the birthday can be changed in the game.)

A person who was suddenly brought from the real world to the dreamlands (the world of Cthulhu Mythos).
He was rescued by Shunith when he was confused about the situation.
So they decided to explore the world together.
Feel free to create the future you want!

 

【People who helps the protagonist】
Since it's an adventure, characters who help the protagonist are essential.
They will sell weapons and armor to the protagonist, and also give him adventure tips!
Characters with different personalities hold the key to the story and bring it to the climax!

 

【Mythical creatures】
Many familiar creatures from Cthulhu Mythos will appear in the game!
In addition to common ones such as moon beasts and deep ones,
powerful gods like Cthulhu and Nyarlathotep also appear!
Various powerful mythical creatures will become obstacles in the adventure!

highlighted.name: This is the grimoire of dark goddess of fertility
This is the grimoire of spider god who lost its name

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains adult content such as sexual behavior, nudity, nakedness, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, BDSM, bestiality, etc. It is not suitable for all viewers. The characters in the game are over 20 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
